sentence.Network_en: I knew they were all drowned by the cannonade.
sentence.Network_cn: 我知道,大炮的声音是压倒一切的.

sentence.Network_en: It was the last of the cannonade.
However, their chirrupings will be stilled before long by the thunder of the cannonade.
sentence.Network_cn: 然而, 他们的窃窃私议不久将被雷鸣般的炮声所淹没.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 炮字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 炮火〖 shellfire〗 炮击〖 cannonade;bombard〗 炮舰〖 gunboat〗.
英语词缀 ... brigade（ 大部队）, cannonade（ 炮轰）, ballad（ 民谣）.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from French, from Italian cannonata, from cannone (see cannon)

entry.def: A cannonade is an intense continuous attack of gunfire.

auth_sentence.content: It was good policy...and showed our enemies that we despised their cannonade.
auth_sentence.res_content: It was good policy...and showed our enemies that we despised their cannonade.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It was good policy...and showed our enemies that we despised their cannonade.

auth_sentence.content: He produced a cannonade of burps, followed by a word of demure apology to no one: Oh, goodness, who let that go?
auth_sentence.res_content: He produced a cannonade of burps, followed by a word of demure apology to no one: Oh, goodness, who let that go?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He produced a cannonade of burps, followed by a word of demure apology to no one: Oh, goodness, who let that go?

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,表示"状态,物品"; 2. "个人或集体"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 拱廊;[一侧或两侧有商店的]通道
stems_affixes.word_buile: arc弓+ade表名词→n.拱廊;[一侧或两侧有商店的]通道

stems_affixes.value_cn: [军队]旅;[担任特殊任务的]团、队
stems_affixes.word_buile: brig战斗+ade集体→n.[军队]旅;[担任特殊任务的]团、队
cannon大炮+ade状态,物品→n.连续开炮,炮击
caval马+c+ade表示集体→n.骑兵队,队伍

stems_affixes.value_cn: 为维护理想,原则而进行的运动或斗争
stems_affixes.word_buile: crus十字形+ade集体→指中世纪十字军,佩戴十字符号,引申为改革运动
lemon柠檬+ade状态,物品→n.柠檬汽水
re反+neg否认+ade表示集体→反过来否认原的[党]→背叛者
barr栏+ic+ade表名词→n.&v.设栅阻挡,栅栏
